cause.description:
Swordfish, Chilean sea bass, Orange roughy and certain types of caviar are four of the soon to be endangered fishes.
More info can be gathered here @ http://www.environmentaldefense.org/article.cfm?contentID=6111 http://www.endangeredfishalliance.org/ http://www.panda.org.za/sassi/ http://www.fws.gov/ http://www.montereybayaquarium.org/cr/cr_seafoodwatch/download.asp
1. Do not serve or consume our four soon to be endangered fishes.
2. Encourage people to use this website to learn about the state of the world's fisheries before choosing seafood for their menus or inventory.
3. Spread the word and save our fishes !
cause.mission: encourage people to make environmentally-wise choices by not serving / consuming four soon to be endangered fishes.
cause.name: Endangered Fish Alliance
